body.name: Ergonomic Memory Foam Neck Pillow with Cooling Case - Adjustable Orthopedic Contour Support for Side, Back, Stomach Sleepers
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 24 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Safe Memory Foam Pillows】The neck pillow is made of CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex certified memory foam, non-toxic and odorless, providing amazing comfort and soft yet firm support for sleeping. The slow rebound memory foam keeps its shape and firmness for long term use. Lying on the orthopedic pillow feels like floating on water or clouds, without any pressure on your skin.

【Premium Ergonomic Contour Pillow】The cervical pillow adopts a unique butterfly shape design and combines with traditional pillow, greatly relieves neck pain and reduces shoulder pressure to achieve a healthy sleep, waking up in the morning without pain. The contoured design keeps your neck and head at the right height and provides excellent support during sleep.

【Removable & Breathable Cooling Pillowcase】The bed pillow comes with a high quality double-layer skin-friendly pillowcase which is soft and breathable. Also the pillow cover is removable with a zipper and machine washable. Polovo pillowcase is made of cold silk technology fabric that fits perfectly to the skin. Soft and cooling fabric keeps you cool all night and have a comfortable sleep!

【2 Personalized Height for Any Sleep Style】Our ergonomic pillows are available in two height options with size 25*13.7*5.2/4.5 inches (L x W x H). The orthopedic and supportive pillow for neck and shoulder pain is designed for multiple sleeping positions, such as side sleeping, supine, stomach sleeping, back sleeping and low pillow sleepers etc.

【Perfect Gift Choice for People】Polovo pillow effectively prevents cervical vertebrae problems and helps reduce sleepless nights. The neck pillow is a great gift for yourself, parents, friends colleagues and all ages people, long-term use will greatly improve the quality of sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more restless nights!
reviews.reviewText: After struggling with computer neck pain and restless nights, I decided to try out this guy out.. It's been a dream, no pun intended :)The first thing that struck me was the quality. The memory foam is of top-notch, providing the perfect balance between support and softness.One of the great features of this pillow is its shape and design.The gentle slope and contouring not only support the natural curve of my neck but also aligns my spine, giving me healthy sleep posture.I've noticed a significant reduction in neck pain and stiffness since I started using this pillow.It's very versatile, whether I sleep on my back or my side, the pillow provides consistent support. The height is just right – not too high to strain my neck or too low to compromise support.The cooling memory foam is awesome, giving me a great comfortable sleeping experience throughout the night.if you're looking for a pillow that combines support, comfort, and durability, this is your guy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillow, great price
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is awesome so far! I've always been unhappy with memory foam pillows but this one seems to maintain its form better than others, when you lift your head it pops right up under you, whereas several others I've had have stayed flat. It is super comfy and my spine is already so much happier. Plus the price is awesome and shipping was super fast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best night sleep in months.
reviews.reviewText: I have been struggling with neck and back pain for a few months and started physical therapy a few weeks ago. I was told to buy a neck pillow and decided to give this one a shot because of the reviews and price. The first night I used this was the first night I actually slept through the night. It really forms around your neck and head and is super supportive without being too hard. The case is silky so it doesn't wreck your hair. There was no smell in my pillow. It came in a super tight roll and needed a few hours to fluff up. It even came two days earlier than it was supposed to. If you are on the fence, just buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great night sleep
reviews.reviewText: Wow! This is really helping me get a better night sleep. I skeptical at first because the pillow looked flat. Then after a day the pillow got fuller and my shoulders don’t hurt when I’m sleeping on my side. When morning comes I fond I’m sleeping on my back. No shoulder or neck hurting in the morning.Believe me I’ve brought many pillows to stop this problem.I’ve brought 2 one for house and another for the truck..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, minor issue
reviews.reviewText: I think this pillow is great if you're a hot sleeper! It definitely stays cool, is squishy and supportive at the same time. My only minor issue is feeling like it's getting a little flatter and less supportive already, but maybe I'm just getting use to it.Either way, love it! And the side piece (the gray) is perfect for when I'm laying in bed on my phone.It is super comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful neck support
reviews.reviewText: I really like this pillow. I really didn't think such a design would make a difference, but it did. The size is just right, for me, anyway. The texture and softness is wonderful. Just the first night and what comfort it provided. I was very pleased and still am. I have had a cervical pillow for the past two years but it hasn't seemed as comfortable as it first was, so I thought it was time for a new one. The price and reviews were great so I decided to give it a try. Wow..., I am not disappointed. I am very pleased with this purchase and would recommended it for anyone who cannot position their neck comfortably for sleep. Very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a very wonky neck and I love sleeping with this pillow. I also use it on my couch behind my head while watching Tv.It has just the right slope for me and I like the way it cradles my head. I also love the cool feel of it, my head doesn’t get warm. I just started using it with a mulberry silk pillowcase (also from Amazon) and the combo is so extra comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great pillow. The memory foam is super nice, not too hard or soft. I like the multiple options for sleeping. I’ve woken up feeling great! The pillow smells at first but that goes away. It’s also a little smaller than most pillows, but it’s worked perfect!
